Common.Highlight.Common.Text: CLASS A FULL BUILDING Plug and Play Sublease!!
Fitness center, conference facility and cafeteria within 4-building complex

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located on Rt 22 with easy access to I-287, I-78 and Routes 202/206; Amenity-rich location within minutes to Bridgewater Commons and other area retail establishments, hotels and restaurants; Approx. 35-minute drive to Newark Liberty International Airport; Under an hour drive to New York City

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Class A office building; Highway frontage on attractive suburban campus; Meticulously landscaped grounds; Fitness center, conference facility and cafeteria within 4-building complex; Outdoor seating area; On-site property management

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
